Title: Relates to the sale of dogs, cats and rabbits by pet dealers; repealer
Summary: Relates to the sale of dogs, cats and rabbits by pet dealers in the state and those that sell such animals through an online platform.
LawCode: Rpld §753-f, §752 sub 8, sub 3 ¶(d), amd §752, Gen Bus L; amd §§16 & 408, rpld §400 sub 4 ¶(d), §408 sub 4 ¶(g), add §409, Ag & Mkts L 2022
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law and the agriculture and markets law, in relation to the sale of dogs, cats, and rabbits by pet dealers; and to repeal certain provisions of such laws relating thereto
